name: Untitled Kitchen Game
description:
Welcome to [Untitled Kitchen Game], a thrilling cooking game where you'll step into the shoes of a busy chef trying to fulfill orders before time runs out. As you play, you'll find yourself slicing, dicing, and cooking up a storm, racing against the clock to satisfy each customer's request.

With each new order that comes in, you'll have to quickly assess the ingredients needed and get to work. You'll chop vegetables, grill meats, and assemble dishes with lightning-fast reflexes, all while keeping an eye on the ticking timer. 

So whether you're a seasoned pro in the kitchen or just love the thrill of a good challenge, [Untitled Kitchen Game] is the perfect game for you. So fire up your stoves, grab your knives, and get ready to cook up a storm!

Controls:

Keyboard

  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Interact: E
  • Alternate Interact: F
  • Pause: ESC

Gamepad

  • Movement: Left Stick
  • Interact: A or South Button
  • Alternate Interact: X or West Button
  • Pause: Start Button
